means: 彬彬有礼的，绅士风度的，绅士派头的

sentence.Network_en: So far, the election campaign has been a very gentlemanly affair.
sentence.Network_cn: 到目前为止，竞选活动都秩序良好。

sentence.Network_en: He was respected by all who knew him for his kind and gentlemanly consideration.
sentence.Network_cn: 他为人谦和而且有绅士风度，认识他的人都很尊重他。

sentence.Network_en: The law, being a profession, was accounted a more gentlemanly pursuit than business.
sentence.Network_cn: 把法律当作职业, 比做生意要高尚一些.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译... ... gentlemanlike 举止高雅的 gentlemanly 绅士派头的 gentlemanship 绅士的身分.
口语自学宝典 ... Generous（ 慷慨的）: Gentlemanly（ 绅士风度的）: Optimistic（ 乐观的）.
外貌形容词_百度文库 ... manly 男人味的 gentlemanly 有绅士风度的 active 主动的，活跃的.
北师大版高中英语选修9 ... respect 尊敬，敬重 gentlemanly 绅士的，绅士似的 sneeze 喷嚏；打喷嚏.

list.abs: 中英对照-中国成语篇2|英语沙龙... ... 来讽刺他。 things seldom seem are strange 37. 道貌岸然 look gentlemanly.
British motor racing used to be a gentlemanly affair , just part of the sporting season ., 在英国 , 赛车过去只是一项绅士的消遣 , 是运动时节的一部分.
he was a gentlemanly Georgian , a person of early American probity ( Mary McGrory ) See Synonyms at honesty他是一个绅士型的佐治亚人，一个具备早期美国德行的人(玛丽麦格罗里)参见
being stingy or making some excuse about not paying doesn't seem to be gentlemanly .而且，表示小气或是找借口谢绝买单看起来好像不那么绅士。
I had so utterly fallen from the gentlemanly estate , as to seek acquaintance with the vilest arts of the gambler by profession .我失去了君子风度，大大堕落，竟至打算摸熟职业赌棍那套下流透顶的骗术。

entry.tran: 彬彬有礼的；有绅士风度的；有教养的
entry.def: If you describe a man's behaviour as gentlemanly, you approve of him because he has good manners.

example.ex: He was respected by all who knew him for his kind and gentlemanly consideration.
example.tran: 他为人谦和而且有绅士风度，认识他的人都很尊重他。

means.word_mean: 1. befitting a man of good breeding;

auth_sentence.content: He was dressed perfectly in a very gentlemanly suit.
auth_sentence.res_content: He was dressed perfectly in a very gentlemanly suit.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was dressed perfectly in a very gentlemanly suit.

auth_sentence.content: He was known as polite and gentlemanly and conflict-averse.
auth_sentence.res_content: He was known as polite and gentlemanly and conflict-averse.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was known as polite and gentlemanly and conflict-averse.

auth_sentence.content: Men are not known for their gentlemanly behaviour.
auth_sentence.res_content: Men are not known for their gentlemanly behaviour.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Men are not known for their gentlemanly behaviour.
